author: Unity
description:
This week, Unity developers from around the world gathered in Barcelona, Spain for Unite 2025. Today’s Keynote packed over an hour of exciting feature reveals and gaming success stories that highlighted Unity’s commitment to supporting you as you develop, deploy, and grow your games. 

There was also a special surprise visit from Epic Games founder and CEO Tim Sweeney, who joined Unity President and CEO Matt Bromberg onstage to talk about how both teams are working together to create more opportunities for the gaming community.

#Unity #Unity2025
title: CEO welcome | Unite 2025 Keynote

author: Unity
description:
The Unite 2025 Keynote took place November 19, 2025 in Barcelona, Spain, where we shared the latest tech, gamedev success stories, and exciting new partnerships with the Unity community.

Russell Ketchum, VP of Grow, and Senior Product Manager Ashley McKemie shared about Unity’s new approach to data, the Data Developer framework, which gives you greater control over how your data is collected and processed. The segment describes how this framework offers configurable, easy-to-understand data collection and usage settings in Unity that devs can extend to players via intent-based consent APIs and controls. From there, the segment zoomed in on Diagnostics, an application of this data that lets devs tap into game health data to tweak game performance on specific devices to unlock unparalleled performance and stability.

#Unity #Unity2025
title: Developer Data & Diagnostics | Unite 2025 Keynote

author: Unity
description:
The Unite 2025 Keynote took place November 19, 2025 in Barcelona, Spain, where we shared the latest tech, dev success stories, and exciting new partnerships with the Unity community.

James Stone shares news of Unity’s new Platform Toolkit, one of the most exciting announcements at this year’s Keynote. Designed to simplify multiplatform development, this new package helps you integrate common SDK features like account management, achievements, controller ownership, game saves, and more – implementing them just once, with the toolkit providing support for all major console, mobile, and desktop platforms, including Steam. Platform Toolkit also provides in-Editor tools to help you test and iterate more quickly during development, while also helping you to more reliably pass platform certification.

#Unity #Unite2025 #GameDev
title: Platform Toolkit | Unite 2025 Keynote

author: Unity
description:
The Unite 2025 Keynote took place November 19, 2025 in Barcelona, Spain, where we shared the latest tech, dev success stories, and exciting new partnerships with the Unity community.

The Unite 2025 Keynote took place November 19, 2025 in Barcelona, Spain, where we shared the latest tech, dev success stories, and exciting new partnerships with the Unity community.

Rus Scammell shared a look at new incremental improvements to 2D tooling, including new features that power greater creative flexibility like streamlined workflows for 3D characters in 2D worlds.

#Unity #Unite2025 #GameDev
title: 2D Tooling | Unite 2025 Keynote

author: Unity
description:
The Unite 2025 Keynote took place November 19, 2025 in Barcelona, Spain, where we shared the latest tech, dev success stories, and exciting new partnerships with the Unity community.

Andy Dennison came onstage to talk about how we’re implementing Production Verification for everything we ship. This means partnering with studios throughout productions to witness their needs firsthand, work that’s already paying off with far fewer bugs and vastly improved build times – all improvements that will make their way into the Unity 6 series. He describes how the Unity Studio Productions (USP) team tested Unity tools and features in Survival Kids, Unity’s first end-to-end game development project in partnership with KONAMI. Andy was joined onstage by James Seaboyer, head of HB Studios,to announce a new partnership between 2K Games and Unity and some news about PGA TOUR 2K25, with a cameo from Tiger Woods.

#Unity #Unite2025 #GameDev
title: Production Verification | Unite 2025 Keynote

author: Unity
description:
The Unite 2025 Keynote took place November 19, 2025 in Barcelona, Spain, where we shared the latest tech, dev success stories, and exciting new partnerships with the Unity community.

Adam Smith, who heads Unity Engine development, describes how we’re focused on being the most stable and performant solution across platforms, and on delivering new levels of iteration speed by reducing build times and time to enter play mode. With a growing developer trend for more creative games coming from shorter dev cycles, we’re leaning in to meet the industry where it is. Landfall Games’ Zorro Svärdendahl shared the story behind the hit climbing co-op PEAK, created with Aggro Crab. The game came together in just 10 weeks of full-time development, which he credits to fast iteration and constant play-testing to find the fun.

#Unity #Unite2025 #UnityEngine
title: Develop, Deploy, Grow | Unite 2025 Keynote

author: Unity
description:
This year’s rulings on app store policies have created an unprecedented opportunity for game developers to retain more revenue. But this freedom comes with complexity—tax compliance, fraud prevention, dispute management, and maintaining high conversion. In this session, Unity and Stripe will explore how gaming commerce is transforming and how developers can gain greater control over their monetization strategies with new options like Stripe in the Unity Engine.

#Unity #Unite2025 #Monetization
title: Beyond native stores: Building for the future of commerce in gaming | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Longer battery life keeps players in the game, and reduced energy consumption fosters a more sustainable game industry. This session shows how to make energy efficiency a product advantage, with actionable steps and production-grade examples. What we’ll cover: - Measure what matters. How to instrument sessions, estimate energy use, and wire telemetry to tie energy to retention and monetization. - Architect for cool, long play. Common pitfalls on mobile and portable consoles and how to choose pipelines, update loops, and asset strategies that reduce heat and extend playtime. - Unlock existing capabilities. Underrated engine and platform features that deliver efficiency without sacrificing player experience.

#Unity #Unite2025 #GameDev
title: Turning energy efficiency from a technical detail to a competitive advantage | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
For mobile and live game developers ready to transform raw data into actionable insights: stop guessing and start owning your data strategy. Join us for a deep dive into Unity’s paradigm-shifting Developer Data framework. This new system puts you in control of how you collect, analyze, and leverage game data across the Unity ecosystem and beyond. Leave this session equipped to use data as a direct driver of performance, engagement, and sustainable monetization at scale.

#Unity #Unite2025 #GameDev
title: From insight to impact: Driving game performance with Unity Developer Data | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Sensor Tower shares trends and insights shaping the games industry across PC, Console & Mobile for 2025. Themes focused from advertising shifts to cross platform and who are the top games and publishers shaping the industry with themes for 2026.

#Unity #Unite2025 #GameDev
title: The state of the gaming industry | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Walmart and Unity partner to bring brand, merchandise, and affiliate capabilities to developers of all sizes. This session will include integration demos, reference cases, and market data.

#Unity #Unite2025
title: Immersive commerce for studios of all sizes | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Discover Unity 6’s Package Ecosystem, designed to help you find and integrate trusted packages so you can build confidently. As a developer, learn how you can find and evaluate packages to quickly determine if they’re a good fit for your project, and help ensure better stability and security in your builds. As a publisher or package creator, learn how to leverage Unity 6's Package ecosystem to help you establish package integrity and earn user trust.

#Unity #Unity2025
title: Build confidently with reliable packages | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Learn how to maximize graphics performance on different platforms with Unity 6.3LTS. Leverage modern graphics APIs like DX12, Metal, and Vulkan, and utilize in-Editor level-of-detail generation. Discover multiple optimizations added since Unity 6, such as the new Renderer User Data for the SRP batcher and optimized post-processing effects. Get practical insights on how to improve visual fidelity, leveraging recent improvements like Adaptive Probe Volumes and rotated reflection probes in URP, or upcoming ones like High Definition Render Pipeline support on portable consoles and Surface Cache real-time diffuse global illumination.

#Unity #Unite2025 #UnityEngine
title: Glow up your graphics with Unity 6.3LTS and beyond | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Discover how Josh Loveridge and Stratton Studios have pioneered Unity web development to create games with tens of millions of plays worldwide. This session explores proven strategies for optimizing load times, streamlining workflows, and delivering next-generation visuals in the browser. From mastering Addressables and build profiles to leveraging WebGPU for groundbreaking performance, Josh will share real-world results and deployment strategies across platforms such as Crazy Games to on-premise interactive display units. Whether you’re scaling to millions of players or pushing the limits of web technology, this session offers a deep dive into the future of web gaming.

#Unity #Unite2025 #UnityEngine
title: Level up your Web builds: Best practices and innovations for Unity Web development | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Bring your OpenXR apps to Android XR using Unity’s proven XR workflows. We’ll walk through key porting steps, explore performance tuning on Android XR, and share real-world insights from a studio that’s already shipped. See how solid OpenXR foundations make porting seamless, and how Android XR lets you take your XR experiences further.

#Unity #Unite2025 #AndroidXR
title: Build once, extend further: Bringing your app to Android XR | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Ready to make your card game pop? In this session, we’ll explore how to create a stunning loot box opening sequence inside Unity. Along the way, we'll learn about custom shaders, anisotropic highlights, parallax depth, VFX, and more. Whether you're building a digital TCG or a flashy UI-driven experience, this talk will show you how to blend technical artistry with gameplay. Demos, tips, and plenty of visual flair included.

#Unity #Unite2025 #GameDev
title: Making it shine: Advanced visual techniques in Unity | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Discover how top mobile game studios have successfully implemented player-first monetization, blending in-app purchases (IAPs) and in-game ads to create thriving free-to-play experiences. In this session, Franco Spina and Zoé Meini (from the Game Design & Revenue team at Unity) share insights on designing engaging, player-centric hybrid monetization strategies. 

Follow Unity on LinkedIn for more insights and case studies from the Game Design & Revenue Consultancy team: 
https://www.linkedin.com/company/unity/

#Unity #Unite2025 #Monetization
title: Player-first monetization: Balancing engagement and revenue in mobile games | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Discover Unity Asset Manager's streamlined workflow for engineering models. Use Asset Transformer and build automation to transform assembly files into GLTF web models via 3D Data Streaming (3DDS), preserving part hierarchy and metadata for easy navigation and validation. Tag models with spatial markers, collaborate using threaded notes, and track issues with Jira integration.

Discover Unity Asset Manager: https://on.unity.com/AssetManager

Start free trial: https://on.unity.com/UnityIndustryTrial

#Unity #Unite2025 #AssetManager
title: The future of engineering with Asset Manager | Unite 2025
